alert.note: Alert for Central Interior; White Mountains and High Terrain South of the Yukon River (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued October 15 at 6:11AM AKDT until October 15 at 11:00AM AKDT by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 AM AKDT THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Snow, rain and freezing rain occuring. Total snow accumulations of up to two inches and ice accumulations of just under one tenth of an inch. * WHERE...White Mountains and High Terrain South of the Yukon River and Central Interior. * WHEN...Until 11 AM AKDT this morning. * IMPACTS...Driving and walking surfaces will be very slippery. Conditions highly variable with some areas wet while other areas will be very icy. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Freezing rain will mix with rain and snow through early morning, then taper off late Sunday morning. Freezing rain is most likely in valley locations, while many hills above 1000 feet will have either rain or snow.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Central Interior; White Mountains and High Terrain South of the Yukon River
